General.Name: Innowireless Co. Ltd
General.Description: Innowireless Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells communication tests and measurement equipment in South Korea. It offers wireless network optimization solutions, such as drive testing, post-processing, benchmark testing, and mobile solutions. The company also provides mobile communication test and measurement solutions comprising RTT, a multi-DUT solution for signal analysis, signal generation, and RF calibration; RF-Master for field engineers; Optic-Master, a hand-held test equipment for installation, maintenance, and diagnosis of fiber optic network; Optic-NMS, a multi-channel OTDR system; and OTDR module for customized fiber monitoring system, as well as AEGIS, a big data solution that allows network operators to measure and analyze the performance of their 3G/4G networks in an integrated platform. In addition, it offers small cell test solutions, such as initial development, SW stability, and manufacturing test solutions. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
